questiontext.text: A practicing dentist is very fond of the latest dental filling materials. According to his study, the filling material is very strong and aesthetically very good. It is the nano hybrid content that makes the material different from the previous generation of filling materials. What is the most appropriate philosophical study for the above scenario?

A student is curious about the metal material in dental braces that can rust (corrosion). Then he made artificial saliva and soaked the stirrup in the artificial saliva. After a month had passed, he found that metal ions were detected in the artificial saliva. This means that the ions are released from the stirrup. This proves the process of rust (corrosion). What is the most appropriate philosophical study for the above scenario?

A 17-year-old woman came to the General Hospital with a complaint that her lower jaw was moving forward and she was not confident. Then the dentist explains to the patient about the benefits of Orthognathic Surgery, starting from the improvement of chewing function, speech function and beauty. It is reassured that the patient will feel confident after treatment. What is the most appropriate philosophical study for the above scenario?

Before starting the teaching-learning process in the classroom, the lecturer asks the students to observe a phenomenon. Then students are asked to record the problems that arise. After that, students are stimulated to think critically in solving existing problems. Meanwhile, the lecturer directs students to ask questions, prove assumptions, and listen to opinions that differ from theirs. What is the learning model implemented in the scenario above?

Learning assessment with PBL is done by authentic assessment. Assessment can be done with a portfolio which is a systematic collection of student work that is analyzed to see learning progress within a certain period of time within the framework of achieving learning objectives. Assessments are given when students discuss the efforts and results of completing the tasks they have done alone or by friends in their groups. What is the appropriate scoring system for the above statement?

A dentist plans outreach activities to housewives in the puskesmas area where he works. This activity is based on data showing the high incidence of caries in children under five. The counseling material that will be delivered is about efforts to prevent caries in toddlers. What is the conceptual type of communication used in the scenario above?

What is the function of communication in the above scenario?

A dentist plans outreach activities to housewives in the puskesmas area where he works. This activity is based on data showing the high incidence of caries in children under five. The counseling material that will be delivered is about efforts to prevent caries in toddlers.

What is the form of communication in the scenario above?

A dentist plans outreach activities to housewives in the puskesmas area where he works. This activity is based on data showing the high incidence of caries in children under five. The counseling material that will be delivered is about efforts to prevent caries in toddlers.

The change in the learning system at Hasanuddin University from TCL to SCL has led to a significant change in the way of learning. Because of that, the mind mapping step was introduced as an alternative way of good learning. Why are the steps above considered a good alternative way of learning?

Changes in the learning system at Hasanuddin University from TCL to SCL, encourage significant changes in the way of learning. Because of that, the mind mapping step was introduced as an alternative way of good learning. Who invented the way of learning mentioned in the scenario?

FKG UNHAS students class of 2021 follow the Problem Based Learning tutorial using the sevenjumps method. In the discussion process to answer questions, it was seen that a student was very dominant in answering each question. This is the attention of the facilitator in the group. Before this stage/step ends, the facilitator reminds the group's agreement about whether the answers submitted are correct or not. Who has the most right and role in reminding the dominant students above?

Students of FKG UNHAS class of 2021 follow the Problem Based Learning tutorial using the seven jumps method. In the discussion process to answer questions, it was seen that a student was very dominant in answering each question. This is the attention of the facilitator in the group. Before this stage/step ends, the facilitator reminds the group's agreement about whether the answers submitted are correct or not.

FKG UNHAS students class 2021 took part in a Problem Based Learning Tutorial using the seven jump method. In the discussion process to answer questions, it was seen that a student was very dominant in answering each question. This is the attention of the facilitator in the group. Before this stage/step ends, the facilitator reminds the group's agreement about whether the answers submitted are correct or not.

answer.text: Checking the achievement of learning objectives
Examine the role of the group leader in answering
Assessing the ability of group members in discussing

questiontext.text: In the tutorial discussion process there was a difference of opinion about the answer to a question and not one answer was found which became the group's decision. The group leader finally decided through group approval that the question would be discussed again. The tutor facilitates by emphasizing that existing answers need to be further developed through the search for relevant references.

In the tutorial discussion process there was a difference of opinion about the answer to a question and not one answer was found which became the group's decision. The group leader finally decided through group approval that the question would be discussed again. The tutor facilitates by emphasizing that existing answers need to be further developed through the search for relevant references. What is the most likely cause for the above conditions?

answer.text: Lack of depth in the discussion
A lot of terminology is not understood
The role of the chairman is not going well
The source of information is only from lecture materials

questiontext.text: In the tutorial discussion process there was a difference of opinion about the answer to a question and not one answer was found which became the group's decision. The group leader finally decided through group approval that the question would be discussed again. The tutor facilitates by emphasizing that existing answers need to be further developed through the search for relevant references.
In a tutorial process on study skills, the time needed for the first tutorial is not enough. This condition causes the fourth and fifth steps in the seven jump to not be executed.

answer.text: The concept in the scenario is well understood by group members
Takes a long time in determining important questions
The group's references are quite diverse
The tutor facilitates the discussion well

questiontext.text: The FKG Unhas dental student class of 2021's tutorial group is carrying out the first tutorial. The group leader invites one of the students to read the scenario. After reading the scenario, the group leader asked the group members to identify the unfamiliar term, one of the students mentioned a terminology that was not understood and no student was able to explain the explanation related to the terminology. What should the group leader do regarding the terminology?

answer.text: Incorporating the terminology into learning objectives
Proceed to the stage of identifying keywords
Proceed to the stage of identifying problems/making questions
Entering the terminology to be discussed in the brainstorming stage
Ask the tutor for help to explain the terminology

questiontext.text: The tutorial group for FKG Unhas dental students class of 2021 is carrying out the first tutorial, students have identified problems by asking questions, then the chairperson asks for approval to proceed to the next stage. One member of the group volunteered and answered the question with analysis. What does the group leader do about this?

answer.text: Ask other group members to respond to the student's answer
Ask other group members to actively add answers to the question
Ask the group members to briefly answer the question
Invite other group members to answer other questions
Asking the tutor's opinion regarding the answers from the group members

questiontext.text: The tutorial group for FKG Unhas students class of 2021 is doing a tutorial, some students have answered questions related to reference tracing. From the explanation and analysis by students, there are some differences related to the reference search method. What are the appropriate steps in this regard?

answer.text: Ask the tutor to explain the correct reference tracing method
Asking one member of the group who answered to correct the answer that is considered inaccurate
The group leader concludes the correct answer regarding the question
Incorporating these questions into learning objectives
Opening references to answer the question

questiontext.text: The tutorial group for FKG Unhas dental students class of 2021 has determined learning objectives and they continue to study independently. One of the learning objectives was delivered by one of the lecturers in his lecture. What can group members do to achieve this?

answer.text: Asking for an explanation from the head of the course block related to the learning objective
Asking for an explanation from the tutor regarding the learning objective
Asking for an explanation from expert lecturers regarding the learning objective
Read lecture notes related to the learning objective
Discuss with group friends to complete the learning objectives

questiontext.text: In the second tutorial, the tutor asks students to report the results of independent learning related to the explanation of the learning objectives. One of the group members volunteered to report the explanation of the learning objectives. What steps should the group leader take in this regard?

answer.text: Ask all other group members to report the explanation of each learning objective
Asking another member to add an explanation regarding the learning objective
Ask other group members to continue discussing the next learning objective
The group leader adds an explanation related to the learning objective
Asking for tutor's approval to continue discussing the next learning objective

questiontext.text: There are several software that can be used for presentations, but most people choose to use the MS PowerPoint program. What is the best reason for the scenario above?

answer.text: This program is a bit difficult to obtain and understand
Icon display is familiar to computer users
can not be displayed on the internet
Highly favored for managing numerical data

questiontext.text: There are several software that can be used for presentations, but most people prefer to use PowerPoint. Layouts on PowerPoint slides are made with several things in mind. How to place the title and layout in the software used in the scenario above?

answer.text: In the area 1/6 of the bottom edge
To make the text easy to read, write 2 spaces

questiontext.text: One of the things that must be arranged in making PowerPoint presentation slides is the selection of colors or color combinations. Color selection on PowerPoint presentation slides aims to make the presentation easy to read. What is the proper setting according to the above scenario?

answer.text: Light font colors are more contrasting with dark background colors and are easy to read
Use a contrasting font color compared to the background color: red with white
Red font color with blue/dark background makes the text easy to read
Layout must be in color with text

questiontext.text: PowerPoint presentation is a communication process between the communicator and the audience so that the message can be conveyed properly. What must be fulfilled in the above scenario??

answer.text: Sentences in the form of bulleted listings
Each slide consists of eighteen bullets
Ten lines of words per slide

questiontext.text: PowerPoint presentation is a communication process between the communicator and the audience so that the message can be conveyed properly. A presentation is said to be effective if the audience can understand the presentation substance. How can a presentation fulfill the above scenario?

What is the right title if you want to change it into a passive sentence without changing the meaning of the article snippet above?

Aplikasi klorheksidin glukonat 2% pada dentin tidak mempengaruhi kuat rekat geser komposit resin yang menggunakan sistem adesif self etch

 

1Dewi Puspitasari, 2Andi Soufyan, 2Ellyza Herda

1Peserta Program Magister Ilmu Kedokteran Gigi Dasar

2Departemen Ilmu Material Kedokteran Gigi

Fakultas Kedokteran Gigi, Universitas Indonesia

Jakarta, Indonesia

 

ABSTRAK

Meskipun resin komposit merupakan restorasi estetik yang banyak digunakan dewasa ini, namun restorasi ini dapat mengalami kegagalan yang disebabkan salah satunya oleh karies sekunder. Klorheksidin glukonat 2% digunakan sebagai disinfektan kavitas untuk mengurangi jumlah mikroorganisme di dalam kavitas yang telah dipreparasi dan untuk mencegah karies sekunder. Penelitian ini dilakukan untuk menganalisis pengaruh klorheksidin glukonat 2% terhadap kuat rekat geser komposit resin dengan sistem adesif self etch pada dentin. Sebanyak 16 spesimen dentin bukal dari mahkota gigi premolar, dibagi menjadi 2 kelompok. Kelompok I: diaplikasi primer Clearfil SE Bond selama 20 detik kemudian aplikasi bonding Clearfil SE Bond selama 10 detik dan polimerisasi dengan sinar selama 10 detik. Resin komposit diaplikasikan secara inkremental dan polimerisasi selama 20 detik. Kelompok II: sebelum aplikasi primer Clearfil SE Bond seperti pada kelompok I, kavitas diberi perlakuan klorheksidin glukonat 2% selama 15 detik. Kuat rekat geser diuji menggunakan testing machine dan dianalisis dengan uji-t tidak berpasangan. Rerata kuat rekat geser tertinggi pada kelompok sistem adesif self etch dengan aplikasi klorheksidin glukonat 2%. Disimpulkan bahwa aplikasi klorheksidin glukonat 2% pada dentin tidak mempengaruhi secara bermakna terhadap kuat rekat geser komposit resin yang menggunakan sistem adesif self etch.

Kata kunci: dentin, sistem adesif self etch, klorheksidin glukonat 2%, kuat rekat geser

answer.text: The shear bond strength of resin composites using a self etch adhesive system is influenced by the application of 2% chlorhexidine gluconate to dentin
The shear bond strength of resin composites using a self etch adhesive system is influenced by the application of 2% chlorhexidine gluconate to dentin
Application of 2% chlorhexidine gluconate to dentin did not affect the shear bond strength of resin composites using a self etch adhesive system.
The application of 2% chlorhexidine gluconate to dentin did not affect the self etch adhesive system of resin composites using shear bond strength.
The shear strength of resin composites using a self etch adhesive system was not affected by the application of 2% chlorhexidine gluconate to dentin.

Fakultas Kedokteran Gigi, Universitas Indonesia

ABSTRAK

Meskipun resin komposit merupakan restorasi estetik yang banyak digunakan dewasa ini, namun restorasi ini dapat mengalami kegagalan yang disebabkan salah satunya oleh karies sekunder. Klorheksidin glukonat 2% digunakan sebagai disinfektan kavitas untuk mengurangi jumlah mikroorganisme di dalam kavitas yang telah dipreparasi dan untuk mencegah karies sekunder. Penelitian ini dilakukan untuk menganalisis pengaruh klorheksidin glukonat 2% terhadap kuat rekat geser komposit resin dengan sistem adesif self etch pada dentin. Sebanyak 16 spesimen dentin bukal dari mahkota gigi premolar, dibagi menjadi 2 kelompok. Kelompok I: diaplikasi primer Clearfil SE Bond selama 20 detik kemudian aplikasi bonding Clearfil SE Bond selama 10 detik dan polimerisasi dengan sinar selama 10 detik. Resin komposit diaplikasikan secara inkremental dan polimerisasi selama 20 detik. Kelompok II: sebelum aplikasi primer Clearfil SE Bond seperti pada kelompok I, kavitas diberi perlakuan klorheksidin glukonat 2% selama 15 detik. Kuat rekat geser diuji menggunakan testing machine dan dianalisis dengan uji-t tidak berpasangan. Rerata kuat rekat geser tertinggi pada kelompok sistem adesif self etch dengan aplikasi klorheksidin glukonat 2%. Disimpulkan bahwa aplikasi klorheksidin glukonat 2% pada dentin tidak mempengaruhi secara bermakna terhadap kuat rekat geser komposit resin yang menggunakan sistem adesif self etch.

Kata kunci: dentin, sistem adesif self etch, klorheksidin glukonat 2%, kuat rekat geser

answer.text: keywords do not need to appear in the title
keywords are not required to be written

questiontext.text:
Which is the most correct statement in the abstract above?

Aplikasi klorheksidin glukonat 2% pada dentin tidak mempengaruhi kuat rekat geser komposit resin yang menggunakan sistem adesif self etch

 

1Dewi Puspitasari, 2Andi Soufyan, 2Ellyza Herda

1Peserta Program Magister Ilmu Kedokteran Gigi Dasar

2Departemen Ilmu Material Kedokteran Gigi

Fakultas Kedokteran Gigi, Universitas Indonesia

Jakarta, Indonesia

 

ABSTRAK

Meskipun resin komposit merupakan restorasi estetik yang banyak digunakan dewasa ini, namun restorasi ini dapat mengalami kegagalan yang disebabkan salah satunya oleh karies sekunder. Klorheksidin glukonat 2% digunakan sebagai disinfektan kavitas untuk mengurangi jumlah mikroorganisme di dalam kavitas yang telah dipreparasi dan untuk mencegah karies sekunder. Penelitian ini dilakukan untuk menganalisis pengaruh klorheksidin glukonat 2% terhadap kuat rekat geser komposit resin dengan sistem adesif self etch pada dentin. Sebanyak 16 spesimen dentin bukal dari mahkota gigi premolar, dibagi menjadi 2 kelompok. Kelompok I: diaplikasi primer Clearfil SE Bond selama 20 detik kemudian aplikasi bonding Clearfil SE Bond selama 10 detik dan polimerisasi dengan sinar selama 10 detik. Resin komposit diaplikasikan secara inkremental dan polimerisasi selama 20 detik. Kelompok II: sebelum aplikasi primer Clearfil SE Bond seperti pada kelompok I, kavitas diberi perlakuan klorheksidin glukonat 2% selama 15 detik. Kuat rekat geser diuji menggunakan testing machine dan dianalisis dengan uji-t tidak berpasangan. Rerata kuat rekat geser tertinggi pada kelompok sistem adesif self etch dengan aplikasi klorheksidin glukonat 2%. Disimpulkan bahwa aplikasi klorheksidin glukonat 2% pada dentin tidak mempengaruhi secara bermakna terhadap kuat rekat geser komposit resin yang menggunakan sistem adesif self etch.

Kata kunci: dentin, sistem adesif self etch, klorheksidin glukonat 2%, kuat rekat geser

answer.text: Introduction: Rerata kuat rekat geser tertinggi pada kelompok sistem adesif self etch dengan aplikasi klorheksidin glukonat 2%.
Method: Kelompok II: sebelum aplikasi primer Clearfil SE Bond seperti pada kelompok I, kavitas diberi perlakuan klorheksidin glukonat 2% selama 15 detik
Result: Klorheksidin glukonat 2% digunakan sebagai disinfektan kavitas untuk mengurangi jumlah mikroorganisme di dalam kavitas yang telah dipreparasi dan untuk mencegah karies sekunder.
Discussion: Disimpulkan bahwa aplikasi klorheksidin glukonat 2% pada dentin tidak mempengaruhi secara bermakna terhadap kuat rekat geser komposit resin yang menggunakan sistem adesif self etch.
Suggestion: Penelitian ini dilakukan untuk menganalisis pengaruh klorheksidin glukonat 2% terhadap kuat rekat geser komposit resin dengan sistem adesif self etch pada dentin

Fakultas Kedokteran Gigi, Universitas Indonesia

ABSTRAK

Sebanyak 16 spesimen dentin bukal dari mahkota gigi premolar, dibagi menjadi 2 kelompok. Kelompok I: diaplikasi primer Clearfil SE Bond selama 20 detik kemudian aplikasi bonding Clearfil SE Bond selama 10 detik dan polimerisasi dengan sinar selama 10 detik. Resin komposit diaplikasikan secara inkremental dan polimerisasi selama 20 detik. Kelompok II: sebelum aplikasi primer Clearfil SE Bond seperti pada kelompok I, kavitas diberi perlakuan klorheksidin glukonat 2% selama 15 detik. Kuat rekat geser diuji menggunakan testing machine dan dianalisis dengan uji-t tidak berpasangan. Rerata kuat rekat geser tertinggi pada kelompok sistem adesif self etch dengan aplikasi klorheksidin glukonat 2%. questiontext.text: Dental students of Hasanuddin University class of 2021 were assigned to compile scientific papers complete with bibliography and one of the references used is reputable international scientific journals. Writing the name of the journal in the bibliography must be in accordance with the medical index. How to write the correct journal name in accordance with the journal writing rules above?

The author's name as the main element in the bibliography must be clearly written so that it can be easily traced by the reader. What are the writing rules that must be observed according to the scenario above?

A dental student will publish his completed scientific paper. After sending his article to the journal, there is a notification and suggestions to improve some things related to the article from the journal. What are the stages of the process mentioned in the narrative above?

A dental student is currently arranging his scientific paper, and to get the latest data or input, the student then searches for scientific references on the internet. The student then gets an article whose contents review several articles. What is the type of this scientific article?

A dental student searches references in the internet for her assignment. The student then got several collections of articles whose contents were from the results of the seminar presentation. What is the type of this scientific article?
A dental student writes a Scientific Paper, which draws a Pie Diagram depicting the distribution of dental and oral disease in area X. What information is obtained from this diagram?

answer.text: Frequency of Continuous data, based on cumulative frequency
Qualitative data as part of the comparison component of the whole
The size of an object from a certain amount with a picture
The frequency of continuous data connecting the midpoints of a histogram
The frequency of continuous data is based on the cumulative frequency in the form of a dotted line

questiontext.text: A student makes a Scientific Writing that displays the term Ibid in a footnote. What does this term mean?

answer.text: The reference cited is from the same source but the page is different from the previous reference which has been punctuated by other references
References cited are sourced from the same source and page as the previous reference which has been interspersed with other references
The reference cited is from the same source but the page is different from the previous reference
The references cited are from the same source and page as the previous reference
The references cited are from the same source and page as the two previous references which have been interspersed by other references

questiontext.text: A dental student makes a Scientific Paper and the references are listed first in a list of footnotes. What is the correct writing system for the above case??

answer.text: Author's name is reversed, title is underlined, includes page number, year of publication and publisher's name
The author's name is not reversed, abbreviated, the title is underlined, includes the page number, year of publication and the name of the publisher
The author's name is written in full without a title, the title is underlined, includes the page number, year of publication and the name of the publisher
Author's name is written in full, not reversed, title is underlined, includes page number, year of publication and name of publisher
The author's name is reversed and abbreviated, the title is underlined, includes the page number, year of publication and the name of the publisher

questiontext.text: A dental student of Internatinal Class of Hasanuddin University makes a scientific paper and the references cited are from the same source but the pages are different for the first and third footnotes. What is the correct writing of the third footnote??

answer.text: Ibid, name, year, title of article

questiontext.text: A student of dentistry will display the writing of numbers related to the number of dental caries sufferers in a scientific paper. What are the exact writing requirements for this?

answer.text: Single-digit numbers without units are written with numbers
The single digit number at the beginning of the sentence is written with the number in parentheses
A one-digit number whose units are written with the name of the number
Numbers with two or more digits at the beginning of the sentence are written with numbers
Numbers with one or more digits at the beginning of the sentence, write the name of the number

questiontext.text: In a student's scientific paper, the results of his research are shown by presenting the value and the number of frequencies in the form of two intersecting lines between independent and dependent numbers. What is the name of the diagram that represent it?

A dental student of International Class of Hasanuddin University makes a scientific paper which presents the results of the study in a table of the distribution of periodontal disease by sex. How to present the table above?

answer.text: The table should display vertical lines
The table should display horizontal lines only at the head and cover of the table
The title of the table is written clearly below the table
The table number must be continuous from the start
The word table is written in capital letters

questiontext.text: A dental student of International Class of Hasanuddin University makes a scientific paper and the references cited are from the same source but the pages are different for the second and fourth footnotes. What is the correct writing of the fourth footnote??

answer.text: Ibid, name, year, title of article

questiontext.text: Clinical skills laboratory is a form of learning method that is carried out in a certain place and dental students play an active role in completing the given rubric through the use of certain tools, materials, and methods. Where is the most appropriate place for the implementation of learning according to the above case?

An oral and maxillofacial surgeon works in a team with an internal medicine specialist and an anesthesiologist in treating a patient. What is the most appropriate objective of the national education system according to the example case above?
